org.epochx.gp.op.crossover
Class OnePointCrossover

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<GPModel>
      org.epochx.gp.op.crossover.OnePointCrossover
All Implemented Interfaces:
GPCrossover, ConfigListener, Listener, Crossover, Operator
public class OnePointCrossover
extends ConfigOperator<GPModel>
implements GPCrossover

This class implements one point crossover as described by Poli and Langdon in their paper Genetic Programming with One-Point Crossover and Point Mutation. It is recommended that a significant mutation rate (Poli & Langdon use 30%) is used in combination with one-point crossover since it encourages rapid convergence.

If a model is provided then the following parameters are loaded upon every configure event:

  • random number generator

If the getModel method returns null then no model is set and whatever static parameters have been set as parameters to the constructor or using the standard accessor methods will be used. If any compulsory parameters remain unset when the crossover is performed then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

See Also:
KozaCrossover, SubtreeCrossover

static Stat XO_POINT1
          Requests an Integer which is the point chosen in the first parent for the uniform point crossover operation.

rng - a RandomNumberGenerator used to lead non-deterministic behaviour.
strict - whether strict one-point crossover should be used where not only must the arity of nodes match, but the node types.

onConfigure

onConfigure in interface ConfigListener

crossover

public GPCandidateProgram[] crossover(CandidateProgram p1,
                                      CandidateProgram p2)
Crosses over the two CandidatePrograms provided as arguments using uniform swap points. Random crossover points are chosen at random in both programs, the genetic material at the points are then exchanged. The resulting programs are returned as new GPCandidateProgram objects.

Specified by:
crossover in interface GPCrossover
Specified by:
crossover in interface Crossover
Parameters:
p1 - The first GPCandidateProgram selected to undergo one point crossover.
p2 - The second GPCandidateProgram selected to undergo one point crossover.
Returns:
An array of the child CandidatePrograms that were the result of an exchange of genetic material between the two parents.

isStrict

public boolean isStrict()
Returns whether strict one-point crossover is being used, or not. If set to true then alignment of the parent programs takes into account not only the arity of the nodes, but also the node type.

Returns:
true if strict one-point crossover is in use, and false otherwise.

setStrict

public void setStrict(boolean strict)
Sets whether strict one-point crossover should be used or not. If set to true then alignment of the parent programs takes into account not only the arity of the nodes, but also the node type.

Parameters:
strict - true if strict one-point crossover should be used, and false otherwise.

getRNG

public RandomNumberGenerator getRNG()
Returns the random number generator that this crossover is using or null if none has been set.

Returns:
the rng the currently set random number generator.

setRNG

public void setRNG(RandomNumberGenerator rng)
Sets the random number generator to use. If a model has been set then this parameter will be overwritten with the random number generator from that model on the next configure event.

Parameters:
rng - the random number generator to set.
